Translations.Text: Ahat Mass nnwen ad Ieun fellawen. Ma tulsem, a Nales. Nerra Loahennama d leebs i ijehliyen
Ih, Leqwoan agi inehhu ar wayen iweqmen mavi, ibecceo lmumnin i ixeddmen ayen ilhan, ar i nitni akafi meqqwoen
Wanag wid ur numin ara s laxeot, Nhegga yasen d aaaqeb aqeoean
Amdan issawal i cceoo, akken issawal i lxio. Amdan izga d aeemmaq

Nerra, iv akked wass, d sin issekniyen. Assekni n yiv Nerra d tellis, Nerra win n wass d win ipwalin, iwakken a pnadim lfevl n Mass nnwen, a ppissinem amvan iseggwasen, akked leesab. Yal ta$awsa, Nfeuuel ip akken iwata
I yal amdan, Ncudd as lbext is s amgarv is. Ass n tnekra, ad as d Nessuffe$ tazmamt ara iaf teldi
Â£eo tazmamt ik! Tqaddev, assa, s yiman ik, i uqeiii k
Win ipwanhan, i iman is kan, win innetlafen, innetlaf mgal iman is kan. Ur ipbibbi yiwen taakkwemt n wayev. Ur Nekkat, alamma Nuzen amazan
Ma Neb$a a Nesqucc tamdint, Neppak lameo i isaiyen is, ad xedmen, degs, cceoo. Ad iaaddi fellas Wawal, a p Nhudd wakali
Aceal n tsuta ay Nesqucc, deffir Nue! Ad Iqadd Mass ik, i tussna akked tmeeoiwt ibekkaven n imdanen iS
